spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is strong, including adjacency and room sequencing. However, the servant room/utility area near the entrance (bottom left of plan) has undergone significant simplification and dimensional scaling errors. Window counts on the right facade are slightly reduced compared to the source.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to the 'floating' model, dark background, and roof removal constraints. All rooms are accounted for. Minor deduction for merging the utility/service area walls into a more generic cuboid shape rather than the exact notched geometry of the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture is used. Bed and sofa orientations match the plan. Kitchen counter layout (L-shape) and dining table placement are correct. Minor deduction for a hallucinated round table in the utility/lower balcony area not shown as a table in the 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect execution of the requested aesthetic. Low-poly, flat-shaded, no textures, and a proper orthographic isometric camera angle. Lighting is soft and consistent with the verification guidelines.

detected_errors.description: Dimensional distortion in the bottom-left utility and servant room area; the structural notches from the 2D plan are smoothed over.
Hallucinated round table placed in the utility/entry balcony area.
